content.text: Billy the Orca Killer is the captain of the Yes Pirates.
He had one of the fifty Ryo Wazamono grade swords, Yamaoroshi. He boasts that he has chopped a killer whale with the sword which explains his epithet.
It is believed Billy had a cocky attitude as he boasted that he has chopped a killer whale with his sword.
It is unknown if Billy was a skilled swordsman, despite possessing such a rare sword.
When he was in Loguetown, he was caught in a conflict with Tashigi. He was defeated and arrested afterwards by Smoker.
